participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative and hands-on, enjoys activities that blend art and utility. Enthusiastic about trying new projects.
participant_1.background: My favorite websites are about home improvement and computer programming. I live in New York and I love the local shops around here. I enjoy the feeling of new sneakers on my feet. I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends at a Chinese restaurant. I like to collect little raincoat-wearing toys, especially the Disney ones.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and artistic, with a passion for creating and a deep appreciation for nature. Enjoys quiet and comfort.
participant_2.background: I want a home in a quiet area where I can focus on my art. My father died when I was young, but I grew up knowing my mother and my siblings. I like to eat healthy and clean, but I also have a sweet tooth for desserts. Superfans my favorite super hero. I enjoy sleeping in on my days off.

content.text: What's your favorite home improvement project you've done?
I love to remodel kitchens. I did a big remodel in my old house.
That's awesome! I love to do projects around the house, too. I'm a little intimidated by kitchens, though.
What are some of your favorite things to do around the house?
I love to paint and fix things. I'm also a big fan of gardening.
I love gardening, too! I have a little garden in my backyard.
That's great! Do you grow anything special?
I grow a lot of vegetables, like tomatoes, peppers, and cucumbers. I also have some flowers.
Thanks! I love spending time in my garden. It's so peaceful.
It sounds like you've got a great space to relax.
Yes, it's my favorite place to be.
